title: 28.) Top 40 Countdown - I'm Not Really Happy
description:
Samantha raised her 12-year-old son alone after his bio dad walked away, and she feels joyless and unsatisfied with life. - Dr. Laura: "Even when life doesn't go the way we want, we do what needs to be done."

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
